column4: hurray! Ubuntu requires 300% less configuration after install than Windows.
that doesn't make sense to me.
you must mean Windows requires 3x the configuration.
It means it requires one third of the work.
I mean, if you cut something down by 300%, you'd have -200%
Which would mean... you wouldn't even have to install it.
you're probably right. I'm a bit tipsy.
Never drink and compute. It's bad :-P
